question.text:
To:Pat Blackburn
From: Go Natural Health Products
Date: February 4, 3:34 P.M.
Subject: Product Order

We appreciate that you have chosen Go Natural Health Products for your vitamin and mineral supplements. All of our products are carefully inspected for quality and meet all government regulations. Additionally, during the month of February, customers making purchases over $100.00 do not have to pay any shipping fees.

Order number: 4330XM21
Order date: February 4, 3:31 P.M.
Shipping address: Pat Blackburn, 2709 Michigan Ave., Clinton WI
Details: 6 bottles of Green Source multivitamin pills.
Total: $180.00, paid with credit card (XXXX xxxx xxxx 8766)

All our products come with a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. If you are dissatisfied, please call our customer service center at 987-555-3427 for a full refund within a week of the order.

Go Natural Health Products
What is indicated about Ms. Blackburn’s order?
choices: (A) It has been insured against loss.
(C) It has been placed by her husband.
(D) It will be delivered free of charge.

answer.text: (D) It will be delivered free of charge.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: " Additionally, during the month of February, customers making purchases over $100.00 do not have to pay any shipping fees."

question.text: Why might Ms. Blackburn call the customer service center by February 11?

answer.explanation: Based on the information given in: "If you are dissatisfied, please call our customer service center at 987-555-3427 for a full refund within a week of the order. "

question.text: Midnight Moon, the new jazz album by guitarist Nick Stanton, will start being sold in stores this Thursday. Midnight Moon is Mr. Stanton’s first album in five years and has received praise from numerous music critics. Mr. Stanton will be signing copies of his new album at Emerson Department Store, located at 4532 Main Street, this Saturday, March 12. An autograph is free with the purchase of the new album.
Who is Nick Stanton?

answer.explanation: Based on the information given in: "Midnight Moon, the new jazz album by guitarist Nick Stanton, will start being sold in stores this Thursday."

question.text: According to the article, what will happen on March 12?
choices: (C) An autograph session will take place.
(D) Some tickets will go on sale.

answer.text: (C) An autograph session will take place.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "An autograph is free with the purchase of the new album."

question.text:
MEMO

To:All Employees
From:Betty Franklin, General Manager
Date:August 19
Subject:Receptionist

To all employees:
- [1] - Greta Jones, the receptionist at our studio will be taking some time off to deal with a personal matter. She will be gone from August 21st to September 5th. - [2] - Ms. Blanche will take care of the regular responsibilities that Ms. Jones usually handles including taking phone calls, handling appointments, organizing schedules, and dealing with clients. Please welcome Ms. Blanche to the studio and be available for her to ask questions if she has any.
Furthermore, if you have any long time clients that you give special prices and discounts to, please let Ms. Blanche know ahead of time. - [3] - She will charge the fees that are programmed into the computer system.
If you have any urgent concerns you need to discuss with Ms. Jones, or if you need to purchase any special hair dyes, treatment shampoos, or other requests that customers have, please do so today and tomorrow before she leaves. –[4]- You can contact me at any time if you have any further questions.
Where do the recipients of the memo most likely work?

answer.explanation: Based on the information given in: "If you have any urgent concerns you need to discuss with Ms. Jones, or if you need to purchase any special hair dyes, treatment shampoos, or other requests that customers have, please do so today and tomorrow before she leaves. –[4]- You can contact me at any time if you have any further questions."

question.text: What is indicated about Greta Jones?
choices: (C) She will take some time off work.

answer.text: (C) She will take some time off work.
answer.explanation: Information is in: "Greta Jones, the receptionist at our studio will be taking some time off to deal with a personal matter."

question.text: By when should employees contact Ms. Jones with urgent business?

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "If you have any urgent concerns you need to discuss with Ms. Jones, or if you need to purchase any special hair dyes, treatment shampoos, or other requests that customers have, please do so today and tomorrow before she leaves."

question.text:
In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3] and [4] does the following sentence belong?
“During this time, we have hired a temporary replacement, Judith Blanche.”

answer.explanation: During this time means the time Greta Jones will take some time off.

question.text:
Shoe Shine

Your number one source for sneakers


We see that you are currently registered as a basic member at our website.
Click here to upgrade to our premium membership.

Once you become a premium member, you will enjoy the following benefits:
- Expedited shipping for $3 ($5 for a basic member)
- Exchanges on all items within 60 days of purchase at no extra charge (30 days for a basic member)
- Returns on all items within 30 days of purchase at no extra charge (7 days for a basic member)

Upgrading your service from basic to premium takes just one click. To welcome customers to our new online store, this month we are offering the upgrade to annual premium membership at a discounted rate of just $50.
What is the purpose of the web page?
choices: (A) To advertise a new line of shoes

answer.explanation:
Information can be inferred from:
"We see that you are currently registered as a basic member at our website.
Click here to upgrade to our premium membership."

question.text: What is NOT mentioned as a benefit of premium membership?
choices: (B) Faster shipping at a reduced price
(C) A longer period of free returns
(D) A  longer period of free exchanges

answer.explanation:
(B) - Expedited shipping for $3 ($5 for a basic member)
(C) - Returns on all items within 30 days of purchase at no extra charge (7 days for a basic member)
(D) - Exchanges on all items within 60 days of purchase at no extra charge (30 days for a basic member)

question.text: What is indicated about Shoe Shine?
choices: (A) It has been in business for decades.
(B) It was founded by a local entrepreneur,
(C) Its merchandise is available through the Internet.

answer.text: (C) Its merchandise is available through the Internet.
answer.explanation: The information is in: "To welcome customers to our new online store, this month we are offering the upgrade to annual premium membership at a discounted rate of just $50."

question.text:
Lisa Hancock   9:39
I'm stopping by a coffee shop on my way to work. What does everyone want? It's on me.

Nick Morton   9:39
Wow thanks! I'll have just black coffee.

Lilly Smith   9:40
Thanks. I'd like a latte. Can you also bring some sugar?

Lisa Hancock   9:41
Sure, I'll bring a couple of the sugar packets.

Richard Park   9:42
I can never turn down coffee. I'll also have a latte with some sugar.

Emily Jordan   9:42
I'd like a herbal tea if they have any. I don't drink anything caffeinated so any tea without caffeine would be great. Thanks.

Lisa Hancock   9:43
Alright then. I'll be there in about 20 minutes with your drinks. See you soon. Oh and before I forget, please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients.

Richard Park   9:44
The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing.

Lisa Hancock   9:45
What do you mean?

Nick Morton   9:45
We're trying to locate the package. We contacted Chantelle and they sent it to the wrong address.

Lisa Hancock   9:46
That's a disaster. Please try to find out where those dresses went.

Richard Park   9:47
Good news. I just got a message from the shipping company and they found the Chantelle order. They're redirecting the shipment to US.

Lisa Hancock   9:48
I almost had a panic attack. When will it get here?

Richard Park   9:48
This afternoon.
What type of business do the participants probably work at?

answer.explanation: Based on the conversation about work: <i>"..please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients.", "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing.", "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing."

question.text: At 9:39, what does Lisa Hancock mean when she says, “It’s on me”?
choices: (D) It’s her turn to get drinks.

answer.explanation: be on sb: used when saying who is responsible for something.

question.text: What is indicated about one of their shipments?
choices: (B) It was returned to the boutique.
(C) It will arrive later in the day.

answer.text: (C) It will arrive later in the day.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing."; "We're trying to locate the package. We contacted Chantelle and they sent it to the wrong address."

question.text: What kind of business is Chantelle?

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Oh and before I forget, please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients."

question.text:
To: All
From: Eric Nixon
Date: January 5, 10:00 A.M
Subject: Shipping Error

Hello everyone,
Lilia Kent, the head of the shipping department, has informed me that yesterday our customer database experienced a system error and, as a result, many orders were sent to the wrong addresses. This morning, our department has already received multiple calls from customers complaining that they received the wrong package. Ms. Kent’s department has been working hard to locate the cause of the mistake. Therefore, any customer that calls with a wrong delivery should be asked to return the package. Additionally, please inform the customers that they will be given a 10 percent discount on their next purchase.
Eric Nixon
Who most likely received the e-mail?

answer.explanation: It can be inferred from: " Additionally, please inform the customers that they will be given a 10 percent discount on their next purchase" that those who need to inform customers is customer service representatives.

question.text: According to the e-mail, what is Ms. Kent’s staff trying to do?

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Ms. Kent’s department has been working hard to locate the cause of the mistake."

question.text: What are recipients of the e-mail advised to do?
choices: (C) Enter data into a customer database
(D) Offer a price reduction to some customers

answer.text: (D) Offer a price reduction to some customers
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Therefore, any customer that calls with a wrong delivery should be asked to return the package. "

question.text:
To: carlhurst@nicknet.com
From: m_winters@tatecc.com
Date: June 1, 1:34 P.M.
Subject: Community Events

Dear Mr. Hurst,
As a loyal customer with a family membership at the Tate Community Center, you have sponsored US with your continued donations. We really appreciate your support.
The following table provides information on upcoming family events this month. We welcome your participation.
Craft Day, June 7 Paul Simpson, June 15 Summer Picnic, June 22
A variety of craft supplies will be available for kids to make their own unique creations. Come and listen to the beautiful music of local singer and songwriter Paul Simpson. Everyone needs to bring a tasty dish to share with others. Free beverages will be provided.

For members, no purchase of tickets is necessary for participation in these events. We encourage you to attend these events and spend quality time with your family.
We look forward to seeing you.

Minnie Winters
Program Coordinator
Tate Community Center
What is suggested about Mr. Hurst?
choices: (D) He works at a community center.

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "As a loyal customer with a family membership at the Tate Community Center, you have sponsored US with your continued donations. "

question.text: Why was the e-mail sent?
choices: (A) To announce a community board meeting
(B) To apply for a family membership
(D) To give information about a local

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred form: "The following table provides information on upcoming family events this month. We welcome your participation."

question.text: What is indicated about Tate Community Center?
choices: (A) Its members gain free admission to the events.
(D) It will serve beverages at all events.

answer.text: (A) Its members gain free admission to the events.
answer.explanation: The information is in: "For members, no purchase of tickets is necessary for participation in these events. "

question.text:
J&P Industries

1462 Swinton street

Cameron, GL 10288

March 29
Mr. Grant Lee
287 Silver Plains Road
Cameron, GL 18729

Dear Mr. Lee,
We thank you for your continued work and your dedication to your job at J&P Industries. -[1] - We are sending all employees information about the new changes that have been made to your health insurance benefits at our company. You will continue to be covered by the same insurance company, but because of the new state regulations that have been put forth, all employees must now undergo a basic medical check-up at a local clinic or hospital. This check-up will be covered by your health insurance, so you do not need to pay any extra fees and this by no means will affect the monthly insurance deductions. -[2] - Included in the envelope is the detailed information about the new medical program for employees.
The medical check-ups will include a blood test, urine test, eye test, height and weight measurements, hearing test, and chest X-rays. - [3] - Please make an appointment with a local clinic. You should have your results given to Karen Leigh at Human Resources by December 30th at the latest. If you fail to get a medical exam, then you may be subject to a fine up to $2000. - [4] - We thank you for your cooperation and hope you abide by the new changes.
If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact Karen at leighk@jpindustries.com.

Sincerely,
John Black
Executive Manager
J&P Industries
What is the purpose of the letter?
choices: (A) To inform an employee about a mandatory exam
(B) To encourage employees to donate blood to the hospital
(C) To discuss the changes made to the health insurance coverage
(D) To advertise the services of a new clinic

answer.text: (A) To inform an employee about a mandatory exam
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "We are sending all employees information about the new changes that have been made to your health insurance benefits at our company. You will continue to be covered by the same insurance company, but because of the new state regulations that have been put forth, all employees must now undergo a basic medical check-up at a local clinic or hospital."

question.text: What did Mr. Black send with the letter?

answer.explanation: The information is in: " Included in the envelope is the detailed information about the new medical program for employees."

question.text: The term “subject to” at the end of the second paragraph is closest in meaning to:

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3] and [4] does the following sentence best belong?
“The appointments should take no longer than 30 minutes.

answer.explanation: Because it is related to "The medical check-ups will include a blood test, urine test, eye test, height and weight measurements, hearing test, and chest X-rays."
